author: cnbc.com
title: Satellite Surf, Inc. Announces Company Name Change to... Universal Telecom Group (UTG)
text:
ORLAND PARK, Ill., Feb. 8, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Satellite Surf Inc, an industry leader in cloud managed voice & data networks for the hospitality industry has announced today that the company will begin operating under a new name and will be known as Universal Telecom Group (UTG), effective immediately. This rebranding strategy reflects both the evolution of the company as well as its vision for the future. Along with this change, a newly redesigned company logo has been revealed and a new website has been launched. Our new logo and website will prominently feature the company's focus on expanding their cloud managed service offerings and growing the UTG brand. The company's ownership and staff have not changed.
President/CEO, Thomas Guziak stated "As we continue to work closely with hotel brands and top hotel management companies, I believe it is the appropriate time to rebrand our company. Our new name will specifically reflect who we are as a company, the premium cloud managed services we provide as well as our global expansion. We are very excited about the introduction of our new company name; Universal Telecom Group (UTG), as it allows us to better represent our business to our clients and the industries we serve."
For more information about the name change or to learn more about Universal Telecom Group, please visit: www.universaltelecomgroup.com
About Universal Telecom Group (UTG).
Universal Telecom Group (UTG) is a managed services provider for both voice and data networks. SIP Trunking, Cloud PBX, managed LAN networks and large WIFI systems are among UTG's offerings. UTG ownership has been serving the hospitality industry and other enterprise clients for more than 20 years.
For more information regarding this announcement, please contact:
